Widget.name: Google Street View
Widget.Description: Allows you to add a Google Street View widget on your page.

Option.name: Widget Title
Option.Description: Widget title. If blank, no name is displayed.

Option.name: Address (1)
Option.Description:
Meta to use for the hit address (text).
If coordinates are also provided with the Latitude Meta and Longitude Meta, they will have a higher priority than the address.
Note: This functionality is slow because we have to get the coordinates of each addresses.

Option.name: Location Meta(2)
Option.Description:
Meta name(s) to use for the hit position with expected format :
  • Location : "meta_of_type_gps_point"
  • Latitude + Longitude : "meta_latitude,meta_longitude"

Option.name: Google maps clientId
Option.Description: If empty, it will use the non premium API (restriction applies).

Option.name: Width
Option.Description: Specifies the width of the Google Map widget. You must enter an integer.

Option.name: Height
Option.Description: Specifies the height of the Google Map widget. You must enter an integer.
